channel.title: [PI] Enhanced Excalibur Spec
channel.description: How would i go about coding in the special for enhanced excalibur? [url=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Enhanced_excalibur]http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Enhanced_excalibur[/url] I think i will just add a spec to the normal excalibur; and probably do something like spec.effect case 7: (enhanced excalibur spec) etc. I would need to have it so you didn't have to attack something to use the special. Any ideas?

item.title: [PI] Enhanced Excalibur Spec
